<p>The number of individual members of the OSC is continuously increasing since its foundation in November 2017 with 17 founding members. With our 4 new members, from 4 different disciplines, the OSC counts 54 members from 15 disciplines.</p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">We are happy to introduce our new members, in alphabetical order:</span></p>
